conversation.text: The usual. Been reading a lotta manga.
It's not about the good manga dude... it's all about the trash manga.
Stuff with super long titles like 'I Can't Leave The Starting Town Until I've Cooked A Five Star Meal??' and 'My Step-Sister Is My Fiance's Favorite Personal Assistant?!'.
It's bad, but it's also like one of those videos that's just a hot knife cutting through sand. Like, that's what it's doing to your brain.
